chapter.title: Terms Of Service
chapter.paragraph: This is a form where data and files can be entered. When this form is submitted, the data and files are uploaded to the server in order to process the request of the user and to provide the requested functionality.

This is done according to the
privacy policy net/splitcells/martins/avots/distro/legal/privacy-policy
of this site. The privacy policy is available at
net/splitcells/martins/avots/distro/legal/privacy-policy
net/splitcells/martins/avots/distro/legal/privacy-policy
.
